datosLaboralesPOJO.descInstitucionLaboral: CONSEJO NACIONAL DE CIENCIA, TECNOLOGIA E INNOVACION TECNOLOGICA - CONCYTEC

datosLaboralesPOJO.descripcion:
	Provide technical support to the National Water Authority on hydrology and hydraulic modeling, groundwater, water resources management and drought studies, hydrological and water management modeling.
	Support the implementation of the National Water Resources Plan.
	Provide technical support in relation to the environmental flow.
	Advise to the ANA specialists on the development of the conceptual and numerical models.

	Led technical projects related to hydrology and hydrogeology, water resources planning and management, climate change effects on water resources.
	Organized, led, supervised, and evaluated technical activities according to rules and procedures of the Direction of Conservation and Water Resources Planning.
	Promoted the implementation of adaptation measures to climate change on water resources.
	Developed studies and proposed policies for exploration and assessment of aquifers, risk manage
Asesor de la Alta Dirección en Gestión de Recursos Hídricos
